pages.text: --- layout: false --- 404 .github-emoji { position: relative; display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; min-height: 1.2em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: top; color: transparent; } .github-emoji > span { position: relative; z-index: 10; } .github-emoji img, .github-emoji .fancybox { margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; border: none !important; outline: none !important; text-decoration: none !important; user-select: none !important; cursor: auto !important; } .github-emoji img { height: 1.2em !important; width: 1.2em !important; position: absolute !important; left: 50% !important; top: 50% !important; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; user-select: none !important; cursor: auto !important; } .github-emoji-fallback { color: inherit; } .github-emoji-fallback img { opacity: 0 !important; } 404é¡µé¢ è¿”å›ä¸»é¡µ

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: This blog is based on framework of Hexo , and the theme Sakura is also on this site. Now what you say is my very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask developers on GitHub.
